1: <sup>1</sup> The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
2: <sup>2</sup> Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;
3: <sup>3</sup> Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.
4: <sup>4</sup> Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
5: <sup>5</sup> We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.
6: <sup>6</sup> Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
7: <sup>7</sup> Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
8: <sup>8</sup> They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
9: <sup>9</sup> Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.
